Pre-Game Insights: Iceland are hungry for revenge against Montenegro, who defeated them 2-1 in a friendly match in 2021.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Iceland had little to no success during the first 60 years of entering the FIFA competitions, but the team then made tremendous progress at the start of the 21st century.
Others: Hakon Haraldsson is a talented midfielder to watch for Iceland, while Stefan Savic and Stevan Jovetic are notable players for Montenegro.
